sources.title: Chinatown Nights
sources.description: Title: Chinatown Nights Summary: Joan Fry, a society woman, falls in love with Chuck Riley, the white-leader of a powerful gang in Chinatown, and he quickly drags her down into the depths with him. But seeing her so much ... Directed by: William A. Wellman Actors: Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 30 March 1929 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 Joan Fry, a society woman, falls in love with Chuck Riley, the white-leader of a powerful gang in Chinatown, and he quickly drags her down into the depths with him. But seeing her so much in love with him causes him to realize he is in love with her, and he determines to lift her up again. "Boston" Charley, the rival gang-leader, has other plans.

sources.title: Chinatown Nights
sources.description: Chinatown Nights Wallace Beery, Florence Vidor, Warner Oland, Jack Oakie 1929 Paramount Directed by William Wellman Produced by David O. Selznick

sources.title: Chinatown Nights (1929) WALLACE BEERYüçï FLORENCE VIDOR
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Director: William A. Wellman
Stars: Wallace Beery, Florence Vidor, Warner Oland

Step into the shadowy alleys of San Francisco‚Äôs Chinatown with a gritty pre-Code gangster flick directed by legendary filmmaker William A. Wellman, just two years before his iconic The Public Enemy. This ultra-rare All-Talking Movietone production stars Wallace Beery, Florence Vidor, and Warner Oland, delivering powerhouse performances in one of early Hollywood‚Äôs most atmospheric crime tales.

Watch Wallace Beery bring his trademark tough-guy charm as he battles Warner Oland for criminal dominance in the neon-lit underworld of Chinatown. Witness the poignant final performance of Florence Vidor, a silent screen legend making her talkie debut and farewell in a role that bridges old Hollywood glamour with the raw edge of early sound cinema.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Directed by William A. Wellman, known for Wings (1927) and The Public Enemy (1931), Chinatown Nights showcases the raw energy and visual grit that define his best work. Brought to you by PizzaFLIX, your home for rare classic films, gangster movies, and vintage Hollywood gems.

‚úÖ Like, Comment, and Subscribe for more from the William Wellman collection, Wallace Beery films, and classic Paramount gangster flicks!

metadata.Plot: Joan Fry, a society woman, falls in love with Chuck Riley, the white-leader of a powerful gang in Chinatown, and he quickly drags her down into the depths with him. But seeing her so much in love with him causes him to realize he is in love with her, and he determines to lift her up again. "Boston" Charley, the rival gang-leader, has other plans.
metadata.Writer: Samuel Ornitz, Ben Grauman Kohn, Oliver H.P. Garrett
metadata.Actors: Wallace Beery, Florence Vidor, Warner Oland
